### <span class="step-number">3</span> Data Frames

<div class="card">
<div class="card-header">Question 3</div>
<div class="card-body">

Create a data frame with two columns: `name` (with values "Alice", "Bob", "Carol") and `score` (with values 90, 85, 92). Then filter to only rows where score > 88.

```{webr-r}
# Write your answer below


```

<div class="accordion mt-3" id="q3Accordion">
<div class="accordion-item">
<h2 class="accordion-header">
<button class="accordion-button collapsed" type="button" data-bs-toggle="collapse" data-bs-target="#q3Answer">
Show Answer
</button>
</h2>
<div id="q3Answer" class="accordion-collapse collapse" data-bs-parent="#q3Accordion">
<div class="accordion-body">

```r
df <- data.frame(
  name = c("Alice", "Bob", "Carol"),
  score = c(90, 85, 92)
)
df[df$score > 88, ]
```

</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
